sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Canons and constitutions ecclesiasticall gathered and put in forme, for the governament of the Church of Scotland. Ratified and approved by his Majesties royall warrand, and ordained to be observed by the clergie, and all others whom they concerne. Published by authoritie. Episcopal Church in Scotland. Baron, Robert, 1593?-1639.
43, [1] p.
Imprinted by Edward Raban, dwelling vpon the Market-place, at the Armes of the Citie, Aberdene : 1636.
Edited by Robert Baron. At foot of title: With royall priviledge. The first leaf is blank. Running title reads: Constitutions and canons ecclesiasticall. With a slip-cancel on E1r. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
=======
Canons and constitutions ecclesiasticall gathered and put in forme, for the governament of the Church of Scotland. Ratified and approved by his Majesties royall warrand, and ordained to be observed by the clergie, and all others whom they concerne. Published by authoritie. Episcopal Church in Scotland. Baron, Robert, 1593?-1639.
43, [1] p.
Imprinted by Edward Raban, dwelling vpon the Market-place, at the Armes of the Citie, Aberdene : 1636.
Edited by Robert Baron. At foot of title: With royall priviledge. The first leaf is blank. Running title reads: Constitutions and canons ecclesiasticall. With a slip-cancel on E1r. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Edward Raban
the Market-place, at the Armes of the Citie
